# OBJECT::SET_OBJECT_IS_A_PRESSURE_PLATE

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** isPressurePlate

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether an articulated object behaves as a pressure plate
